segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar, and the stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a stool that's about to tip over, and he doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how precarious his position is; it's like he's defying gravity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her cookie, her hand outstretched and ready.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both being very sneaky, taking cookies without asking permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's plate is ready to catch any cookies he manages to grab, like he's done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, taking cookies when no one's looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable; I'm really worried he might fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what they're up to, putting a stop to their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is quite tense, with the potential for accidents all around, but the children seem oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't noticed the children's antics yet; she's really not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
